project.title: [Client Redacted] - Office 365 Migration from Exchange & Domino

challenge.summary: Reorganize software development team from unstructured, chaotic environment to fluid Agile and Scrum-based team while modernizing infrastructure and deployment processes.

solution.summary: Strategic approach to communication systems migration:
deliverables: Unified communication strategy transitioning to Office 365
Hybrid migration approach for phased user transition
Custom solutions for legacy system data handling

outcomes: ✅ Improved user experience with modern email platform

items: Amazon AWS (EC2, S3, AutoScaling, Elastic Load Balancing)
